subject: U.S.A. HomeLand Security Dep
body:
U.S.A. HomeLand Security Department.
Bureau of Consular Affairs
Washington , DC 20520
Greeting from U.S.A. Home Land Security,
THIS MESSAGE IS ONLY FOR THE OWNER OF THIS E-MAIL ADDRESS:
Attention: BENEFICIARY?
We the undersigned Department of U.s Homeland security, with full
corporate authority and with full legal responsibility, do hereby notify
you that your ATM VISA CARD has been brought into our custody this morning
and we're waiting for your message before the delivery can be continue to
your delivery address. IN our ongoing security INVESTIGATION here in UN House of
Assemble annual conference live at New York city , the U.S HOME-LAND
SECURITY, had dictated an ATM VISA CARD worth of $6.7 million US dollars
which you were supposed to receive earlier last month from USPS delivery
company , but it was on hold by the U.S Department of Security here in New
York city, due to lack of clearance certificate required for gate pass.
Besides, he was given a bill of $3067 for the clearing stamp or he must
obtain the clearance certificate to back up the delivery as legitimate
package.
As a result of you that not complying within the time limit demanded by
the U.S Department of State, then your ATM VISA CARD was moved to IMF
UNCLAIMED office. but After Lock down exercise, we resolved that it must
treat normal and secured , now we've had a brief meeting held by our
Board of Directors yesterday, which was concluded that the delivery of
your ATM VISA CARD will move to your address within 2 working days .
Note, the welfare of United States embassy are concerns and I'm here to
take the protocol of all our duties . since your USPS delivery diplomat
had left your tag and the parcel because of the clearance certificate.
in other words we are now requesting that you should only pay the sum
of $105.00 nothing more for the clearance certificate and your ATM
VISA CARD will arrive at
your address within 2 days..
Note that your ATM VISA CARD has arrived in our custody U.S Department of
Homeland security and we're waiting to receive clearance
certificate before the gate pass is giving, remember that you will only
receive the parcel through mailing express upon your comply with our
requirement which is by
sending the sum of $105.00 to enable us obtain the new needed clearance
certificate and effect the delivery of your ATM CARD immediately.
Meanwhile, you
are advised to
reconfirm your current living address upon contacting us to avoid delivery
to the wrong address.
1, Your full name:
2, Your home address:
3, Direct telephone number
4, Postal code require.
Try and send the $105.00 today to the information stated below for
immediate release of your ATM CARD;
Your Sincerely,
Contact person: HON Green Nelsen
Email  ( 
greennelsen@gmail.com
 )

subject: Re:   U.S.A. HomeLand Security Dep
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite an unexpected message. I'm a bit confused though, could you please explain why my ATM VISA CARD was brought into your custody? 

Also, I'm curious about the clearance process. What does it entail and why is it necessary?

Best wishes,
Alicia
